summary: "Wheel of Fortune" is a popular American TV game show that started in 1975. Contestants win cash and prizes by solving word puzzles, similar to hangman, and spinning a big wheel. The show has had many hosts over the years, with Pat Sajak being the longest-serving. It's the longest-running syndicated game show in the U.S., with over 8,000 episodes. The show has also been adapted in many countries and has spin-offs, like "Celebrity Wheel of Fortune."
title: Wheel of Fortune (American game show)
